title: Upsell - Personal to Business Plan
description: A customer with a personal account calls to add a 4th line. The agent should identify this as an opportunity to upsell to a more suitable business plan.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the request to add a line and identify that this would be the 4th line.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer's current number of lines.

tasks.description: Propose converting to a business plan, explaining the benefits (e.g., shared data, better pricing at scale).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully pivots the conversation to a business plan offer.

tasks.description: Convert the personal account to a business account and add the new lines.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the account type change and adds the new lines.
